short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swivvel is an audio-app that remote, hybrid and distributed teams use to eliminate the lag in remote collaboration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swivvel.io is an audio-app that remote, hybrid, & distributed teams use to eliminate the lag in remote collaboration. 

OVERVIEW 
This Chrome extension is a companion app for the Swivvel desktop app. 

INTEGRATE GOOGLE MEET 
Companies that use Google Meet use the Chrome extension to sync real-time meeting participant data into Swivvel. 

INTEGRATE VOIP & DIALERS
Customer-facing teams (Sales, CX, etc.) use the Chrome extension to integrate Swivvel with browser-based phone systems like Salesloft, Outreach.io, and Dialpad, or click-to-dial tools built into CRMs like Hubspot and Salesforce.
